about_the_game:
Season 5 MyTEAM Bonus Offer & MyCAREER Bonus Offer will expire at 7:59AM PT, April 4th, 2025. Any purchase of the Season 5 MyTEAM Bonus Offer or MyCAREER Bonus Offer is non-refundable. Terms Apply.

NBA 2K25 Season 5 MyCAREER Bonus Offer includes the following items:

• 120 Minute 2XP Coin (MC)

• St. Patrick’s Day Benny The Bull Costume

• KD 4 Nerf

• 75,000 VC

*NBA 2K Account required. One redemption per NBA 2K Account. Offer Ends: April 4th, 2025 7:59AM PT. Terms Apply.
detailed_description:
Season 5 MyTEAM Bonus Offer & MyCAREER Bonus Offer will expire at 7:59AM PT, April 4th, 2025. Any purchase of the Season 5 MyTEAM Bonus Offer or MyCAREER Bonus Offer is non-refundable. Terms Apply.

NBA 2K25 Season 5 MyCAREER Bonus Offer includes the following items:

• 120 Minute 2XP Coin (MC)

• St. Patrick’s Day Benny The Bull Costume

• KD 4 Nerf

• 75,000 VC

*NBA 2K Account required. One redemption per NBA 2K Account. Offer Ends: April 4th, 2025 7:59AM PT. Terms Apply.
